instruction: Generate a potential revenue stream for a mobile game.
output: One potential revenue stream for a mobile game is selling in-game items, such as special powers or custom skins. Players can also purchase coins, which can be exchanged for new levels, characters, or items. Advertising could also be used, with players watching ads in exchange for rewards. Finally, players can pay for subscriptions, which could provide them with access to exclusive content.

instruction: Describe how to make pancakes.
output: To make pancakes, you will need 1 cup of flour, 1 teaspoon of baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon of salt, 1 cup of milk, 1 egg, and 2 tablespoons of melted butter. Start by sifting the flour, baking powder and salt together in one bowl. In a separate bowl, beat together the egg, milk, and melted butter. Then, pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Heat a skillet over medium-low heat and grease with butter. Pour about 1/4 cup of pancake batter into the hot skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the edges appear crispy. Flip and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes, or until the pancakes are golden brown. Serve with favorite toppings, such as butter, syrup, or fresh fruit.

instruction: Explain the concept of predictive analytics.
output: Predictive analytics is a type of data analytics that uses data mining, machine learning and statistics to analyze current data patterns and make predictions about future events. It is used to identify important trends and make predictions about likely outcomes. Predictive analytics can be used to help businesses make informed decisions and better understand their customers, competitors and markets.

output: Dairy product

instruction: Generate a recipe that involves apples.
output:
Apple Fritters: 
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/4 cup butter, melted, 1 egg, 1 cup milk, 2 cups peeled and diced apples, 1/4 cup of butter for frying, 1/4 cup white sugar for coating. 
Instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the flour, baking powder, salt, and 2 tablespoons of sugar. Mix in the melted butter, egg, and milk. Gradually add in the chopped apples until evenly distributed.    
In a large skillet, heat the 1/4 cup butter over medium-high heat. Drop rounded spoonfuls of batter into the hot oil. Fry each side until lightly browned. Remove from heat and allow to cool slightly on a paper towel. Dip the fritters in the 1/4 cup of sugar and enjoy.

instruction: Report the amount of energy required by a given device.
output: The average laptop computer consumes between 20 and 45 Watts of energy on average.

instruction: Generate a list of common ingredients that can be used for making vegan food.
output: Common ingredients for making vegan food include rice, beans and other legumes, tofu, tempeh, grains, nuts and seeds, fruits and vegetables, plant-based milks and dairy alternatives, plant-based cheeses, vinegars, nutritional yeast, herbs and spices, nut and seed butters, avocado, vegetables, vegan proteins, and vegan sweeteners.

instruction: Give advice about how to keep oneself healthy.
output: One of the best ways to stay healthy is to maintain a healthy diet, exercise regularly, get enough sleep, manage stress, practice good hygiene, and visit your doctor for routine checkups. Additionally, it's important to limit consumption of alcohol, tobacco and other drugs.

instruction: Generate a plan for a road trip from San Francisco to Los Angeles.
output: Begin the trip by driving South on I-5, stopping in Santa Nella for lunch, and then heading through the San Joaquin Valley. Visit Tachi Palace Casino and Resort along the way and spend the night in Bakersfield.  On the second day, drive down the scenic route to gather some amazing views of the mountains, and then continue on to Los Angeles. Be sure to stop in Coalinga for a snack and stretch your legs, and don't forget to take plenty of pictures along the way.

instruction: Create a title for a blog post about reducing waste for a greener planet.
output: Saving the Planet, One Piece of Waste at a Time: Simple Tips for Reducing Your Eco-Footprint

instruction: Create a short story with a twist
output:
Once upon a time, there was a young man named Jake who lived in a small quiet town. He had always been a dreamer, imagining a life where he could be anything and do anything he wanted.

One night, as Jake lay in his bed, he heard a mysterious voice calling out his name. He looked around his bedroom, but there was no one there. Then he heard the voice again, begging him to follow it.

Filled with curiosity and determination, Jake followed the voice, heading deeper and deeper into the forest. After what felt like hours of walking, he found himself in a clearing that seemed to shimmer in the moonlight. He heard the voice again, and it told him he had arrived at the wishing tree.

Jake gazed up at the ancient tree before him, and couldn't believe his eyes. The impossible had happened - it was a tree that grew coins, dollars, and even gems.

Unable to believe his luck, Jake started filling his pockets with the precious items he found around the tree. But just as he was about to leave, a fierce creature stepped out of the darkness. 

Jake scrambled away, only to find the creature had transformed into the mysterious voice he heard earlier. It turns out, the voice was actually a spell cast by an evil witch who was trying to trap people with her illusions. 

Luckily Jake was smart and brave, and he was able to outsmart the witch and escape with his life and treasures. From that day on, Jake's life was never the same again.

instruction: Read the following article and summarize it in a maximum of 50 words
input: The world of finance can be both fascinating and intimidating, especially if you’re not sure where to start. A good financial guide can provide direction and help you plan your goals and investments. The financial advisor should have the expertise to advise and guide you on topics like budgeting, tax planning, investments, and retirement planning.
output: Financial advisors provide direction and guidance to help you reach your goals. They are skilled in many areas such as budgeting, investing, taxes, and retirement planning. By working with one, you can gain the knowledge to take control of your finances and secure your financial future.

input: The study found that there were more cells expressed in the presence of the mutant peptide compared to the wildtype peptide.
output: The expression of cells was increased in the presence of the mutant peptide compared to the wildtype peptide.

instruction: Update the following recipe to feed 10 instead of 8 people
input: Preheat oven to 350F. Grease an 8-inch spring-form pan with butter. Cut 8 apples into small pieces and combine with 3/4 cup of sugar, 1 teaspoon of cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon of nutmeg, and 1/4 teaspoon of ground ginger. Mix together the ingredients and spread them in the pan. Sprinkle an additional 1/4 cup of sugar over the mixture and bake in the oven for 40 minutes.
output: Preheat oven to 350F. Grease a 10-inch spring-form pan with butter. Cut 10 apples into small pieces and combine with 1 cup of sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons of cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon of nutmeg, and 1/2 teaspoon of ground ginger. Mix together the ingredients and spread them in the pan. Sprinkle an additional 1/2 cup of sugar over the mixture and bake in the oven for 60 minutes.

instruction: What is the origin of the phrase "keeping up with the Joneses?"
output: The phrase "keeping up with the Joneses" originated in 1913 as the title of a comic strip by Arthur R. "Pop" Momand. In the comic strip, two families, the Smiths and the Joneses, were portrayed as two middle-class families that were constantly competing to one-up each other in possessions and appearances. The phrase has since come to describe the constant striving for material possessions that reflect social class and comparison to one's peers.

instruction: Generate an essay on the following topic
input: The impact of technology on society
output:
Technology has had a profound impact on society and has changed the way we live our lives. From the way we communicate to the way we interact with our surroundings, technology has pushed almost every aspect of life to evolve in recent years.

The introduction of smartphones has revolutionized the way we stay connected, with many people glued to their devices for hours a day. Social media has brought people together from all over the world and enabled connections that wouldn’t have been possible before. As a result, people have access to a greater range of perspectives, knowledge, and information than ever before.

With the proliferation of technology, businesses and companies have been able to make more efficient use of their resources, with the advent of automation and artificial intelligence allowing for companies to save on labour costs and dedicate more resources to product development and customer service. This has resulted in products being delivered faster and to more people, a key element in driving economic growth.

In addition, technology has changed the way we consume information, with the internet and streaming media allowing us to access almost any piece of content with a few clicks. This has resulted in a democratization of information, allowing people to be better informed and to make more informed decisions.

The introduction and progression of technology has made life much easier and allowed us to make the most of our time and resources. Despite the many benefits that technology has provided us with, there is a danger of overusing and becoming reliant on technology and losing some of our humanity in the process. Nevertheless, it is only through embracing technology that we can make the most of our lives.

output: Glucose

instruction: What is the chemical reaction that occurs when vinegar and baking soda are mixed together?
output: The chemical reaction that occurs when vinegar and baking soda are mixed together is an acid-base reaction. The acetic acid (vinegar) reacts with the sodium bicarbonate (baking soda) to form carbon dioxide, water, and sodium acetate.
